label: RemoteSharePointKnowledgeSourceParameters
description: Parameters for remote SharePoint knowledge source.

fields.label: Container Type ID
fields.tooltip: Container ID for SharePoint Embedded connection. When this is null, it will use SharePoint Online.

fields.label: Filter Expression
fields.tooltip: Keyword Query Language (KQL) expression with queryable SharePoint properties and attributes to scope the retrieval before the query runs.

fields.label: Resource Metadata
fields.tooltip: A list of metadata fields to be returned for each item in the response. Only retrievable metadata properties can be included in this list.
